description: This header file declares internal functions for the Web Uri Path Object, including functions to get/set path names, manage resource ownership, reset state, and manage URI paths, for use in the Web server/client/application implementation.

methods.name: WebUpoIsRemoveable
methods.description: Checks if the Web URI Path object can be removed.

methods.name: WebUpoGetPathName
methods.description: Retrieves the path name associated with the Web URI Path object.

methods.name: WebUpoSetPathName
methods.description: Sets the path name for the Web URI Path object.

methods.name: WebUpoGetResourceOwner
methods.description: Retrieves the resource owner handle associated with the Web URI Path object.

methods.name: WebUpoSetResourceOwner
methods.description: Sets the resource owner handle for the Web URI Path object.

methods.name: WebUpoReset
methods.description: Resets the Web URI Path object to its default state.

methods.name: WebUpoGetUriPath
methods.description: Gets the URI path object for a given path string.

methods.name: WebUpoAddUriPath
methods.description: Adds a new URI path to the Web URI Path object.

methods.name: WebUpoDelUriPath
methods.description: Deletes a specified URI path from the Web URI Path object.

methods.name: WebUpoDelAllUriPaths
methods.description: Removes all URI paths from the Web URI Path object.
